(row = 8, col = 32)

Okay, the avatar is at (8, 32). There are levers around the avatar. To the left is a leverLeft (*), and to the right is a leverRight (b), and below is a leverDown (&). The objective is to eliminate the passengers (l). The suitcases ($) seem to be on a conveyor belt on row 2. There's a passenger at (6, 9). I will try to activate the lever to the right first.
Action: 2
